cities_title: Visit One Of Our Countries Now
cities_desc: Discover the best offers in each city, curated just for you. Immerse yourself in a world of savings and indulge in unparalleled experiences.

Cities.description: Dubai is a city and emirate in the United Arab Emirates known for luxury shopping, ultramodern architecture, and a lively nightlife scene. The Burj Khalifa, an 830m-tall tower, dominates the skyscraper-filled skyline. At its foot lies the Dubai Fountain, with jets and lights choreographed to music. On artificial islands just offshore is Atlantis, The Palm, a resort with water and marine-animal parks.

Antalya is one of the fastest growing cities in Turkey, attracting tourists from all over the world with its beautiful beaches and a wonderful mix of traditional Turkish culture. Children will love Aqua Land (a water slide paradise) and Dolphin Land (home to dolphins, sea lions, and white whales) at Beach Park. Explore the old city center and see the Hadrian's Gate.

Sharm El Sheikh is a tourist center on the Sinai Peninsula, known for some of the best diving spots in the world. The underwater wonders of Ras Muhammad National Park have elevated the city to a new level. The city has dive sites and shipwrecks that attract advanced and recreational divers from around the world to explore the parallel underwater life of the Red Sea.

Istanbul is the most populous city in Turkey and its cultural, economic, and historical center. It is located in the northwestern part of Turkey and is divided by the Bosporus Strait, which connects the Marmara and Black Seas, into Europe and Asia. It is the only city in the world located on two continents.
